mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST(MEMBERID,PRODUCTNO) SELECT #{memberId},#{productNo} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 0 FROM WISHLIST WHERE PRODUCTNO=#{productNo} AND MEMBERID=#{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCTNO, P.PRODUCTNAME, P.PRODUCTIMG, P.PRICE FROM WISHLIST JOIN PRODUCT P ON WISHLIST.PRODUCTNO=P.PRODUCTNO WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE PRODUCTNO=#{productNo} AND MEMBERID=#{memberId}
